snippet: A Moscow court on Thursday ordered Eduard Limonov, a political opposition leader, to pay a $380 fine for organizing an unsanctioned demonstration.
abstract: Moscow court orders political opposition leader Eduard Limonov to pay a $380 fine for organizing an unsanctioned July demonstration to support freedom of assembly; punishment is one of the first to be levied through tough new law to clamp down on street protests.
lead_paragraph: A Moscow court on Thursday ordered Eduard Limonov, a political opposition leader, to pay a $380 fine for organizing an unsanctioned demonstration.

headline.seo: Russia: Political Activist Fined Under New Law
headline.main: Russia: Activist Fined Under New Law
headline.print_headline: Russia: Activist Fined Under New Law
